pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, February 6, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with the Federation of Canadian Municipalities’ Big City Mayors’ Caucus, and deliver brief opening remarks. Deputy Prime Minister Chrystia Freeland will be in attendance.

Main Ballroom
Fairmont Château Laurier
1 Rideau Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage of remarks for FCM-accredited media. For accreditation, please contact media@fcm.ca.
  • Media are asked to present themselves to the Laurier Room no later than 9:30 a.m.

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.           

Canada Reception Centre
190 Clear Skies Private

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 5:30 p.m.
